languages.text: Помог{mf||ла} Соломону стать человечнее и найти новый способ служить закону.
Helped Solomorne find his humanity and a new way to serve the law.
languages.original_text: Помог{mf||ла} Соломону стать человечнее и найти новый способ служить закону.

traits.locale_text: Helped Solomorne find his humanity and a new way to serve the law.
Helped Solomorne find his humanity and a new way to serve the law.
Helped Solomorne find his humanity and a new way to serve the law.
Helped Solomorne find his humanity and a new way to serve the law.
Helped Solomorne find his humanity and a new way to serve the law.

languages.text: ソロモーンが人間性を取り戻し、法に仕える新たな道を見つける手助けをしてやった。
languages.original_text: Helped Solomorne find his humanity and a new way to serve the law.

traits.locale_text: ソロモーンが人間性を取り戻し、法に仕える新たな道を見つける手助けをしてやった。

languages.text: Solomorne geholfen, seine Menschlichkeit zu finden – und einen neuen Weg, dem Gesetz zu dienen.
languages.original_text: Helped Solomorne find his humanity and a new way to serve the law.

traits.locale_text: Solomorne geholfen, seine Menschlichkeit zu finden – und einen neuen Weg, dem Gesetz zu dienen.

languages.text: Vous avez aidé Solomorne à renouer avec son humanité et à trouver une nouvelle manière de servir la loi.
languages.original_text: Helped Solomorne find his humanity and a new way to serve the law.

traits.locale_text: Vous avez aidé Solomorne à renouer avec son humanité et à trouver une nouvelle manière de servir la loi.

languages.text: Ayudaste a Solomorne a hallar su humanidad y un nuevo modo de imponer la ley.
languages.original_text: Helped Solomorne find his humanity and a new way to serve the law.

traits.locale_text: Ayudaste a Solomorne a hallar su humanidad y un nuevo modo de imponer la ley.

languages.text: 你帮助索罗蒙找到了人性，发现了为帝国律法效力的新方法。
languages.original_text: Helped Solomorne find his humanity and a new way to serve the law.

traits.locale_text: 你帮助索罗蒙找到了人性，发现了为帝国律法效力的新方法。

languages.text: Solomorne'un insanlığını ve kanunlara hizmet etmenin yeni bir yolunu bulmasına yardım ettin.
languages.original_text: Helped Solomorne find his humanity and a new way to serve the law.

traits.locale_text: Solomorne'un insanlığını ve kanunlara hizmet etmesinin yeni bir yolunu bulmasına yardım eder.
